Name.BusinessNameLine1: CEREBRAL PALSY OF NORTH JERSEY INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO INVOLVE DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED PEOPLE IN THE MAINSTREAM OF SOCIETY IN A MEANINGFUL WAY THROUGH TREATMENT, EDUCATION AND REHABILITATION BY MAXIMIZING THEIR ABILITIES AND MINIMIZING THEIR DISABILITIES.
IRS990.MissionDescription: CEREBRAL PALSY OF NORTH JERSEY IS DEDICATED TO ENHANCING THE LIVES OF PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES AND OTHER SPECIAL NEEDS BY SUPPORTING PERSONAL GROWTH, INDEPENCENCE AND PARTICIPATION IN THE COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Description: EDUCATION & THERAPY (PHYSICAL, OCCUPATIONAL, SPEECH) FOR DEVELOPMENTALLY DELAYED & DISABLED CHILDREN - LOWER SCHOOL

Activity2.Description: EDUCATION & THERAPY (PHYSICAL, OCCUPATIONAL, SPEECH) FOR DEVELOPMENTALLY DELAYED & DISABLED CHILDREN - HIGH SCHOOL

Activity3.Description: ADULT PROGRAMS - ADULT TRAINING CENTERS AND GROUP HOMES - PROVIDES TREATMENT, REHABILITATION TRAINING SERVICES, AND HOUSING TO ADULTS WITH COGNITIVE IMPAIRMENTS AND OTHER DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

ActivityOther.Description: EARLY INTERVENTION PROGRAM - REHABILITATION & TREATMENT SERVICES FOR INFANTS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DELAYS & DISABILITIES FROM BIRTH TO 3 YEARS OF AGE AND PRIVATE OUTPATIENT THERAPY SERVICES AND OTHER
PRIVATE OUTPATIENT THERAPY SERVICES AND OTHER

ContractorCompensation.DescriptionOfServices: PURCHASES OF IT RELATED SERVICES, COMPUT

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: STUDENTS ARE PLACED BY NEW JERSEY PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICTS WHICH ARE BY DEFINITION, NONDISCRIMINATORY
IRS990ScheduleE.GovtFinancialAidExplanation: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES AID FOR THE ADULT AND SCHOOL FOOD PROGRAMS TO HELP DEFRAY THE COSTS OF ITS FOOD PROGRAMS. ALSO, THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES OTHER FEDERAL GRANTS TO SUPPORT ITS ADULT PROGRAMS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DRAFT COPY OF FORM 990 PROVIDED TO GOVERNING BODY'S FINANCE COMMITTEE AND TO FULL BOARD. VOTE FOR APPROVAL WILL BE TAKEN

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EACH TRUSTEE AND KEY STAFF MEMBERS COMPLETE ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM, WHICH ARE REVIEWED AND MONITORED BY THE FULL BOARD AT BOARD MEETING

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND COMPLETES PERFORMANCE EVALUATION OF CEO ON AN ANNUAL BASIS AND DETERMINES COMPENSATION FOR CEO. KEY EMPLOYEES HAVE ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATION. STATE OF NJ DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION PUBLISHES, BY COUNTY, LIST OF MAXIMUM SALARIES BY CERTAIN KEY POSITIONS IN ORGANIZATIONS

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS A FINANCE COMMITTEE WHICH REVIEWS THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

Form990ScheduleRPartI.PrimaryActivities: FUTURE GROUP HOME FOR THE DISABLED
